content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position(x=5.5, y=0.5)
Consists of steam engine(position x=5.5, y=0.5) and offshore pump (position x=-7.5, y=25.5)

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using entities that are not connected
- Ensure that entities such as steam engines and offshore pumps are properly connected before attempting to use them.
### Errors when no pipe group or electricity group is found
- Make sure to create and connect pipe groups and electricity groups to the relevant entities, such as offshore pumps and steam engines, to enable their functionality.
